bets.title: Will He Finish?
bets.description: Will Sammy complete all 690 laps without quitting?

bets.title: Under 7 Hours?
bets.description: Will he finish the marathon in under 7 hours total time?

bets.title: How Many Breaks?
bets.description: Will he take more than 10 breaks during the run?

bets.title: How Many Times Will He Yak?
bets.description: Will Sammy throw up at least once during the marathon?
